name: RTCDataChannel.error_event
description: A WebRTC error event is sent to an RTCDataChannel object's onerror error handler when an error occurs on the data channel.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
refs.description: The definition of 'error event' in the 'WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers' specification.
